<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements a ScalarEvolution-based transformation to set</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given an expression for the (constant) alignment, AlignSCEV, and an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expression for the displacement between a pointer and the aligned address,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DiffSCEV, compute the alignment of the displaced pointer if it can be reduced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a constant. Using SCEV to compute alignment handles the case where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DiffSCEV is a recurrence with constant start such that the aligned offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is constant. e.g. &#123;16,+,32&#125; % 32 -&gt; 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="#a6a5d252746b8261a4f76454c49bb8437"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> <a href="#a6a5d252746b8261a4f76454c49bb8437">getNewAlignmentDiff</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;DiffSCEV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;AlignSCEV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DiffUnits = Diff % int64&#95;t(Alignment)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;DiffUnitsSCEV = SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a13b9eb961d35ad9ecb3b633f5703253a">getURemExpr</a>(DiffSCEV, AlignSCEV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\talignment relative to &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;AlignSCEV &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; is &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; &#42;DiffUnitsSCEV &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (diff: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;DiffSCEV &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;)\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevconstant">SCEVConstant</a> &#42;ConstDUSCEV =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(DiffUnitsSCEV)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t DiffUnits = ConstDUSCEV-&gt;getValue()-&gt;getSExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the displacement is an exact multiple of the alignment, then the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// displaced pointer has the same alignment as the aligned pointer, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return the alignment value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DiffUnits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(AlignSCEV)-&gt;getValue()-&gt;getAlignValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the displacement is not an exact multiple, but the remainder is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant, then return this remainder (but only if it is a power of 2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t DiffUnitsAbs = std::abs(DiffUnits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a434f6a0d80fb13e4326e848a6391f057">isPowerOf2&#95;64</a>(DiffUnitsAbs))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(DiffUnitsAbs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is an address given by an offset OffSCEV from AASCEV which has an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment AlignSCEV. Use that information, if possible, to compute a new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment for Ptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="#af2917523aba1c4fae828904ab0992254"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="#af2917523aba1c4fae828904ab0992254">getNewAlignment</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;AASCEV, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;AlignSCEV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;OffSCEV, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVCouldNotCompute&gt;</a>(DiffSCEV))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On 32-bit platforms, DiffSCEV might now have type i32 -- we&#39;ve always</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sign-extended OffSCEV to i64, so make sure they agree again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DiffSCEV = SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a38c440751f1bf5f19bc12b95f8f0f2a6">getNoopOrSignExtend</a>(DiffSCEV, OffSCEV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// What we really want to know is the overall offset to the aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address. This address is displaced by the provided offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DiffSCEV = SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#aef6d2bea715d1793e956f41ddeea2320">getAddExpr</a>(DiffSCEV, OffSCEV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;AFI: alignment of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; relative to &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; &#42;AlignSCEV &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; and offset &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;OffSCEV</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; using diff &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;DiffSCEV &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewAlignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;DiffARSCEV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(DiffSCEV)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The relative offset to the alignment assumption did not yield a constant,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but we should try harder: if we assume that a is 32-byte aligned, then in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (i = 0; i &lt; 1024; i += 4) r += a&#91;i&#93;; not all of the loads from a are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32-byte aligned, but instead alternate between 32 and 16-byte alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As a result, the new alignment will not be a constant, but can still</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be improved over the default (of 4) to 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;DiffStartSCEV = DiffARSCEV-&gt;getStart();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;DiffIncSCEV = DiffARSCEV-&gt;getStepRecurrence(&#42;SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\ttrying start/inc alignment using start &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; &#42;DiffStartSCEV &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; and inc &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;DiffIncSCEV &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now compute the new alignment using the displacement to the value in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first iteration, and also the alignment using the per-iteration delta.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If these are the same, then use that answer. Otherwise, use the smaller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one, but only if it divides the larger one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> NewAlignment = <a href="#a6a5d252746b8261a4f76454c49bb8437">getNewAlignmentDiff</a>(DiffStartSCEV, AlignSCEV, SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> NewIncAlignment =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tnew start alignment: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ad46cdbe68b494ca6f426b0ca5269f6a4">DebugStr</a>(NewAlignment)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
